title: 新人求助，暮色官方发布的mod如何安装？
author: DeubleEagle
txt_content:

TVT

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
暮色森林MOD？

https://www.mcmod.cn/download/61.html
直接在这里下载吧
不知道你说的是哪个

replies.author: DeubleEagle
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-4-1 23:46
